Name: Snakeybus
About the game: Snakeybus is a casual arcade game that requires a balance between reflexes and forethought. Weave through the city streets and pick up as many passengers as you can. Drop your passengers at their destinations to cash in. The more people you drop off, the more your bus grows in length. Play smart and avoid crashing into yourself! Features Online Multiplayer Power Ups and Weapons 11 Core Single Player Maps with Unique Themes 5 Different Types of Buses Endless Play Mode Player Progression with unlockable Maps and Buses Personal & Global Leaderboards Incomplete Controller Support
